workflow.name: Generate AI proposals as PDFs with GPT-4, Gmail, Google Drive and Slack
workflow.description:
# üìÑ AI Proposal Generator with PDF Delivery & Team Notifications

## Description

Creating client proposals manually is slow, repetitive, and often inconsistent. This AI-powered workflow transforms proposal creation from a manual task into a fully automated, professional process.

With a single submission, this workflow generates a customized AI-written proposal, converts it into a polished PDF, emails it to the client, stores it in Google Drive, and notifies your internal team ‚Äî ensuring faster turnaround, consistent quality, and zero missed steps.

---

## What This Workflow Does

This workflow turns client requirements into ready-to-send proposals with minimal effort:

üìù **Capture Client & Project Details** ‚Äì A webhook receives client information, project scope, budget range, and timeline.

üß† **AI-Powered Proposal Writing** ‚Äì AI generates a structured, client-ready proposal tailored to the project requirements.

üìÑ **HTML Proposal Formatting** ‚Äì The proposal content is converted into a clean, professional HTML layout.

üìë **PDF Generation** ‚Äì The HTML proposal is automatically converted into a downloadable PDF.

üìß **Email Delivery** ‚Äì The proposal PDF is emailed directly to the client.

‚òÅÔ∏è **Google Drive Storage** ‚Äì A copy of the proposal is saved for record-keeping and reuse.

üí¨ **Slack Notification** ‚Äì Your team is notified when a proposal is generated and sent.

üîÅ **Webhook Response** ‚Äì Returns a confirmation response for frontend or system integrations.

---

## Key Features

ü§ñ **AI Proposal Generation** ‚Äì Automatically creates professional proposals based on project inputs.

‚öôÔ∏è **End-to-End Automation** ‚Äì From input submission to PDF delivery, everything runs automatically.

üìÑ **Professional PDF Output** ‚Äì Client-ready proposals with clean formatting.

üìß **Automated Email Sending** ‚Äì No manual follow-ups required.

‚òÅÔ∏è **Centralized Storage** ‚Äì All proposals stored securely in Google Drive.

üí¨ **Team Notifications** ‚Äì Instant Slack alerts for visibility and tracking.

üîÄ **Flexible Integration** ‚Äì Can be triggered from forms, CRMs, or web apps.

---

## Perfect For

üöÄ **Freelancers & Consultants** ‚Äì Send proposals faster without writing from scratch.

üè¢ **Agencies & Service Providers** ‚Äì Standardize proposal quality across teams.

üìà **Sales & Operations Teams** ‚Äì Reduce manual work and response time.

üíª **Startups & Small Businesses** ‚Äì Look professional without extra overhead.

üß† **Remote Teams** ‚Äì Keep everyone aligned with automated notifications.

---

## What You‚Äôll Need

### Required Integrations

üåê **Webhook Trigger** ‚Äì Receives client and project details.

ü§ñ **OpenAI** ‚Äì Generates proposal content.

üìÑ **HTMLCSS to PDF** ‚Äì Converts HTML proposals into PDFs.

üìß **Gmail** ‚Äì Sends proposal emails to clients.

‚òÅÔ∏è **Google Drive** ‚Äì Stores generated proposal files.

üí¨ **Slack** ‚Äì Sends internal notifications.

---

## Optional Enhancements

üìä **CRM Integration** ‚Äì Save proposal data to HubSpot, Airtable, or Salesforce.

üé® **Brand Customization** ‚Äì Add logos, brand colors, and styling to proposals.

üåç **Multilingual Proposals** ‚Äì Generate proposals in different languages.

üîê **Approval Step** ‚Äì Add internal approval before sending proposals.

üìà **Analytics Dashboard** ‚Äì Track proposal volume and turnaround time.

üìé **File Attachments** ‚Äì Include additional documents with the proposal email.

---

## Quick Start

1Ô∏è‚É£ Import the workflow template into your n8n workspace
2Ô∏è‚É£ Connect credentials for OpenAI, Gmail, Google Drive, Slack, and HTMLCSS to PDF
3Ô∏è‚É£ Send test data to the webhook with client and project details
4Ô∏è‚É£ Review the generated proposal PDF
5Ô∏è‚É£ Activate the workflow and start sending proposals automatically

---

## Customization Options

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Proposal Branding** ‚Äì Update HTML layout, fonts, and colors.
2Ô∏è‚É£ **AI Prompt Tuning** ‚Äì Adjust tone, length, or structure of proposals.
3Ô∏è‚É£ **Email Messaging** ‚Äì Customize email subject and content.
4Ô∏è‚É£ **Slack Messages** ‚Äì Modify notification text or channels.
5Ô∏è‚É£ **Drive Organization** ‚Äì Change folder structure for stored proposals.
6Ô∏è‚É£ **Pricing Logic** ‚Äì Adjust calculations for budget or timeline.

---

## Expected Results

‚ö° **Faster Proposal Turnaround** ‚Äì Generate proposals in minutes instead of hours.

ü§ñ **Consistent Quality** ‚Äì Every proposal follows a structured format.

üìß **Instant Delivery** ‚Äì Clients receive proposals immediately.

üóÇÔ∏è **Organized Records** ‚Äì All proposals stored automatically.

üí¨ **Better Team Visibility** ‚Äì Everyone stays informed with Slack alerts.

---

## Workflow Structure Visualization

üìù Webhook Input
‚Üì
üß† AI Proposal Generation
‚Üì
üìÑ HTML Formatting
‚Üì
üìë PDF Conversion
‚Üì
üìß Email Delivery
‚Üì
‚òÅÔ∏è Google Drive Storage
‚Üì
üí¨ Slack Notification
‚Üì
üîÅ Webhook Response

---

### üöÄ Ready to Automate Proposal Creation?

Import this template and let AI handle proposal writing, formatting, delivery, and tracking ‚Äî so you can focus on closing deals faster. ‚ú®

parameters.message:
=

üìã Your Project Proposal

Tailored exclusively for {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.client_name }}

Dear {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.client_name }},

Thank you for considering us for your {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.project_type }} project. We're excited about the opportunity to work together!

I've prepared a comprehensive proposal that outlines our strategic approach, detailed timeline, and transparent investment breakdown. Please find the attached PDF for your review.

‚ö° Quick Overview

üì¶ Project: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.project_type }}
‚è±Ô∏è Timeline: {{ $('Extract AI Content').item.json.delivery_timeline }}
üí∞ Investment: ${{ $('Extract AI Content').item.json.base_price }} - ${{ $('Extract AI Content').item.json.max_price }}
üìÑ Proposal #: {{ $('Extract AI Content').item.json.proposal_number }}

üí¨ Have questions or need adjustments?
I'm here to help! Feel free to reach out anytime.

I look forward to the opportunity to bring your vision to life and create something exceptional together.

Best regards,

Your Name

Your Title | Your Company
üìß your.email@company.com | üì± +1 (555) 123-4567

This proposal is valid for 30 days from the date of issue.
parameters.subject: =Your Project Proposal - {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.project_type }}

values.content:
=You are an expert freelance proposal writer with 10+ years of experience. Your proposals are known for being:
- Professional and client-focused
- Specific to client needs (never generic)
- Clear and persuasive without being salesy
- Well-structured with actionable details

Write proposals that demonstrate deep understanding of the client's problem and show how you'll solve it. Use confident, warm language. Focus on value and outcomes, not just deliverables.

Format your response with clear section headers:
## Executive Summary
## Project Scope
## Methodology
## Timeline & Milestones
## Investment Breakdown
## Why Choose Us

Keep each section concise but comprehensive. Use bullet points where appropriate.

parameters.content:
### How It Works
This workflow automates proposal generation for freelancers and agencies. When a client submits their project details through the webhook, the workflow processes their budget range and timeline, then uses OpenAI GPT-4 to generate a customized, professional proposal with sections covering executive summary, scope, methodology, timeline, and pricing. The AI-generated content is formatted into a branded HTML template, converted to PDF, and delivered via three channels: emailed directly to the client with the PDF attached, uploaded to Google Drive for your records, and posted to Slack to notify your team. The entire process completes in seconds, ensuring clients receive polished proposals instantly while your team stays informed.

### Setup Steps
1. Connect required credentials: OpenAI API, HTML-to-PDF service, Gmail, Google Drive, and Slack.
2. Update the email template with your company name, contact details, and branding.
3. Configure the Google Drive folder ID where proposals should be stored.
4. Set your Slack channel for proposal notifications.
5. Copy the webhook URL and integrate it into your contact form or CRM.
6. Test with sample client data to verify all integrations work correctly.

### Customization
- Modify the OpenAI system prompt to match your writing style and industry focus.
- Adjust the HTML template styling to match your brand colors and logo.
- Customize email subject lines and body content for your business tone.

## Input & Configuration
Receives client project details via webhook and calculates pricing, timeline, and proposal metadata.

## AI Content Generation
Uses OpenAI GPT-4 to write a customized proposal, then formats it into a professional HTML document.

## PDF Creation & Distribution
Converts HTML to PDF and delivers via email, Google Drive storage, and Slack team notification.

## Completion
Merges all execution paths and returns a structured JSON success response to the caller.
